publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-2110 Compensation Scheme for Former Icelandic Water Trawlermen (lodged on 14 August 2001) Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*

S1M-2110 Richard Lochhead: Compensation Scheme for Former Icelandic Water Trawlermen—That the Parliament supports the campaign to obtain compensation payments for former Icelandic water trawlermen in Scotland; congratulates those affected on their campaign to date, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make urgent representations to the Department of Trade and Industry on behalf of all Scottish former trawlermen who meet eligibility criteria for the compensation scheme, but have not yet received compensation. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan, Donald Gorrie, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram

Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan, Donald Gorrie, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Shona Robison, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Tricia Marwick, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Brian Adam, Alasdair Morgan
